casebody.data:
AMERICAN MARINE CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Lamar C. JONES, Universal Marine Company, et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 71-1011

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 4, 1971. *731Neal D. Hobson, Karl E. Boellert, New Orleans, La., for plaintiff-appellant; Milling, Saal, Benson, Woodard & Hill-yer, New Orleans, of counsel. Gibbons Burke, New Orleans, La., for defendants-appellees.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part. I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
